GPT-4.1 Prompting Guide

This document provides a series of important prompting tips for developers to fully leverage the improved capabilities of GPT-4.1, including providing context examples, making instructions specific and clear, and inducing planning via prompting. The model is trained to follow instructions more closely and is highly steerable and responsive to well-specified prompts.
